sentences.en: ...terminal cancer.
sentences.cn: …晚期癌症。

sentences.en: ...the positive terminal of the battery.
sentences.cn: …电池的正极。

sentences.en: a terminal branch of a tree
sentences.cn: 树顶枝条

sentences.en: As soon as he was clear of the terminal building he looked round.
sentences.cn: 他一离开机场大楼，就环顾了一下四周。

sentences.en: As with the Ethernet switches, you can view the running configuration in order to do some sanity checking of the configuration on the terminal servers, if required.
sentences.cn: 同处理以太网交换机一样，可以查看运行的配置，以便在终端服务器上对配置进行完备性检查（如果需要的话）。

sentences.en: Carl sits at a computer terminal 40 hours a week.
sentences.cn: 卡尔每周在电脑终端前坐40个小时。

sentences.en: ferry/bus terminal
sentences.cn: .渡船码头/公共汽车终点站

sentences.en: Flights for Rome depart from Terminal 3.
sentences.cn: 飞往罗马的班机从3号航站楼出发。

sentences.en: He is in the terminal stage of cancer.
sentences.cn: 他正处于癌症晚期.

sentences.en: He made a round-trip to the terminal and back.
sentences.cn: 他到了终点，又折回来。

sentences.en: He then soldered the wire to the telephone terminal.
sentences.cn: 接着他把电话线焊接到电话机上。

sentences.en: He was eventually diagnosed as suffering from terminal cancer.
sentences.cn: 他最终被诊断出患了晚期癌症。

sentences.en: If flying is so safe, why do they call the airport the terminal?
sentences.cn: 如果飞行是这么的安全，为什么他们管飞机场叫“终端”？

sentences.en: In aerobic systems, oxygen is the terminal electron acceptor and is reduced.
sentences.cn: 在需氧体系中, 氧是末端电子接受体并且被还原.

sentences.en: Looking back afterwards you will see that this was not a terminal trough in your career.
sentences.cn: 今后回想起来你就会明白，这并非你事业中一蹶不振的低谷。

sentences.en: My own house feels as filthy and chaotic as a bus terminal.
sentences.cn: 我自家的房子感觉又脏又乱，活像公共汽车终点站。

sentences.en: So that the security policy from the network and network promotion between extended to each network terminal.
sentences.cn: 从而使安全策略从网络与网络之间推广延伸到每个网络末端。

sentences.en: terminal cancer
sentences.cn: 晚期癌症

sentences.en: terminal examinations (= at the end of a course, etc.)
sentences.cn: 期终考试

sentences.en: the airport’s passenger terminal
sentences.cn: 机场航站楼

sentences.en: The car has reached its terminal speed and can run faster no longer.
sentences.cn: 这辆车的速度已达到了极限,不能再跑更快了.

sentences.en: The ileocecal valve and terminal ileum are usually dilated rather than stenosed.
sentences.cn: 回盲部和末端回肠常呈扩张面而不狭窄.

sentences.en: The terminal fittings on the cable are standard bearing sockets.
sentences.cn: 钢索的端部连接采用标准承压锚杯.

sentences.en: The terminal was constructed of reinforced concrete.
sentences.cn: 这个终点站是用钢筋水泥建造的.

sentences.en: There's a taxi stand outside the terminal.
sentences.cn: 在终点站的外面有出租车.

words.tran_cn: 最后；在末端；处于末期症状上；致命地
限制的,有边界的,轮廓鲜明的

phrases.tran_cn: 公车总站，公车终站，巴士站
渡轮码头；车船联运港；客轮码头
航站楼；候机楼；机场大厦；候机室建筑物
终端机用户；联机检索订户
端电压；高压电极电压；终端电压

trans.tran_cn: 致命的，患绝症的，不可挽回的，末梢的
trans.tran_en: a terminal illness cannot be cured, and causes death

trans.tran_cn: 航空站，终点站，集散地，终端，线接头
trans.tran_en: a big building where people wait to get onto planes, buses, or ships, or where goods are loaded
